name: Pokeable
description:
Pokeable is a small game about eating an apple, that's really all you have to know
(original description)

Pokeable is a bullet hell SHMUP, made for the Taira games Halloween jam,  where you control the hand of a very bored man to finally get that apple he wanted for so long

the soundtrack, composed by TangoStar can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/tangostar/sets/pokeable-soundtrack
